ShockShield is the effect that you gain when casting Ice and Lightning in a combo. It provides damage reduction just like the FrostShield spell, but also reflects some damage back to melee attackers. This upgrade increases the duration of the ShockShield skill by 1, and increases the damage reflected to melee attackers by 5%. Each level of this skill costs 2 skill points, and provides 1 point of progress in the skill tree for both of it's elements. The max level of this skill is 2.

ShockShield is the effect that you gain when casting Ice and Lightning in a combo. It provides damage reduction just like the FrostShield spell, but also reflects some damage back to melee attackers. This upgrade increases the duration of the ShockShield skill by 1, and increases the damage reflected to melee attackers by 5%. Each level of this skill costs 2 skill points, and provides 1 point of progress in the skill tree for both of it's elements. The max level of this skill is 2.

ShockShield is the effect that you gain when casting Ice and Lightning in a combo. It provides damage reduction just like the FrostShield spell, but also reflects some damage back to melee attackers. This upgrade increases the duration of the ShockShield skill by 1, and increases the damage reflected to melee attackers by 5%. Each level of this skill costs 2 skill points, and provides 1 point of progress in the skill tree for both of it's elements. You've hit the max level of this skill.

Frostburn is the debuff you inflict on enemies when you cast Ice and Fire in a combo. The effect reduces the opponents defense and deals damage each turn it is active. This upgrade increases the duration of the Frost Burn skill by 1, and increases the amount this skill reduces enemies defense by 5%. Each level of this skill costs 2 skill points, and provides 1 point of progress in the skill tree for both of it's elements. The max level of this skill is 2.

Frostburn is the debuff you inflict on enemies when you cast Ice and Fire in a combo. The effect reduces the opponents defense and deals damage each turn it is active. This upgrade increases the duration of the Frost Burn skill by 1, and increases the amount this skill reduces enemies defense by 5%. Each level of this skill costs 2 skill points, and provides 1 point of progress in the skill tree for both of it's elements. The max level of this skill is 2.

Frostburn is the debuff you inflict on enemies when you cast Ice and Fire in a combo. The effect reduces the opponents defense and deals damage each turn it is active. This upgrade increases the duration of the Frost Burn skill by 1, and increases the amount this skill reduces enemies defense by 5%. Each level of this skill costs 2 skill points, and provides 1 point of progress in the skill tree for both of it's elements. You've hit the max level of this skill.

Firestorm is the combo effect you get when casting Fire and Lightning together. It deals significant damage to one foe, and has an AOE damage effect that hits all of your foes. This upgrade increases the portion of the damage that hits \fball\fb enemies in this spell, including the original target, by 30%, as well as causing this spell to set all enemies hit on fire, dealing the same damage as the burn spell but only lasting a single turn. This skill costs 2 skill points, and provides 1 point of progress in both of its elements. The max level of this skill is 2.

Firestorm is the combo effect you get when casting Fire and Lightning together. It deals significant damage to one foe, and has an AOE damage effect that hits all of your foes. This upgrade increases the portion of the damage that hits \fball\fb enemies in this spell, including the original target, by 30%, as well as increasing this spells burn duration to 2 turns. This skill costs 2 skill points, and provides 1 point of progress in both of its elements. The max level of this skill is 2.

Firestorm is the combo effect you get when casting Fire and Lightning together. It deals significant damage to one foe, and has an AOE damage effect that hits all of your foes. This upgrade increases the portion of the damage that hits \fball\fb enemies in this spell, including the original target, as well as causing this spell to set all enemies hit on fire, dealing the same damage as the burn spell but only lasting a single turn. This skill costs 2 skill points, and provides 1 point of progress in both of its elements. The max level of this skill is 2.

Frost Shield activates when you cast Ice without it being part of a combo, reducing the damage you take for a certain amount of turns. This upgrades increases the damage reduction of frost shield by 4% per level. The max level of this skill is 3.

Frost Shield activates when you cast Ice without it being part of a combo, reducing the damage you take for a certain amount of turns. This upgrades increases the damage reduction of frost shield by 4% per level. The max level of this skill is 3.

Hail is a powerful single target spell, which creates a mass of ice to hail down upon a foe. The spell also pulls all of the ice from FrostShield as well, adding more damage to the spell the more stacks of that ability you have active. This spell consumes all stacks of frost shield when cast.
Every time you unlock a new empowered magic spell, you gain another charge of empowered magic, which refill upon a full rest. This skill only has one level, and costs two skill points to unlock.
Extra Damage per stack of FrostShield: 2 + 20% of your power

Hail is a powerful single target spell, which creates a mass of ice to hail down upon a foe. The spell also pulls all of the ice from FrostShield as well, adding more damage to the spell the more stacks of that ability you have active. This spell consumes all stacks of frost armor when cast.
Every time you unlock a new empowered magic spell, you gain another charge of empowered magic, which refill upon a full rest. This skill only has one level, and costs two skill points to unlock.
Extra Damage per stack of FrostShield: 2 + 20% of your power

Frozen Fortress is a purely defensive ability, granting significant damage reduction for several turns, alongside a bonus shield equal to 20% of your maximum health which lasts until it is destroyed by enemy attacks, or the fight ends. The skills innate defensive bonus provides a 25% damage reduction for three turns, but also provides the Frost Shield defensive bonus, the damage reduction of which is based upon your current level in the Frost Shield skill.
Every time you unlock a new empowered magic spell, you gain another charge of empowered magic, which refill upon a full rest. This skill only has one level, and costs two skill points to unlock.

Frozen Fortress is a purely defensive ability, granting significant damage reduction for several turns, alongside a bonus shield equal to 20% of your maximum health which lasts until it is destroyed by enemy attacks, or the fight ends. The skills innate defensive bonus provides a 25% damage reduction for three turns, but also provides the Frost Shield defensive bonus, the duration and damage reduction of which is based upon your current level in the Frost Shield skill.
Every time you unlock a new empowered magic spell, you gain another charge of empowered magic, which refill upon a full rest. This skill only has one level, and costs two skill points to unlock.

Upgrading this skill grants you access to Pillar of Flames, a powerful spell which envelops your foe in a pillar of fire, blinding them and setting them ablaze. This will cause your foe to panic, forcing them to use a basic attack and pick a target at random, even harming themselves at times. The burn effect of this spell is the same as the burn from the basic Fire spell.
Every time you unlock a new empowered magic spell, you gain another charge of empowered magic, which refill upon a full rest. This skill only has one level, and costs two skill points to unlock.

Upgrading this skill grants you access to Pillar of Flames, a powerful spell which envelops your foe in a pillar of fire, blinding them and setting them ablaze. This will cause your foe to panic, forcing them to use a basic attack and pick a target at random, even harming themselves at times. The damage of the burn is based on the current level of your burn skill.
Every time you unlock a new empowered magic spell, you gain another charge of empowered magic, which refill upon a full rest. This skill only has one level, and costs two skill points to unlock.

Upgrading this skill grants you access to Flame Wave, allowing you to crash a wave of fire into all of your foes, stunning them for a turn and setting them ablaze. The burn effect of this spell is the same as the burn from the basic Fire spell.
Every time you unlock a new empowered magic spell, you gain another charge of empowered magic, which refill upon a full rest. This skill only has one level, and costs two skill points to unlock.

Upgrading this skill grants you access to Flame Wave, allowing you to crash a wave of fire into all of your foes, stunning them for a turn and setting them ablaze. The burn effect of this spell is the same as the burn from the basic Fire spell.
Every time you unlock a new empowered magic spell, you gain another charge of empowered magic, which refill upon a full rest. This skill only has one level, and costs two skill points to unlock.

Upgrading this skill grants you access to Barrage, a powerful spell that lets you rain down three successive bolts of lightning onto a single foe. Each bolt of lightning has an innate 60% chance to stun your enemy, but will also separately proc the electric shock skill if youve upgraded it, potentially letting you stun an opponent for 6 turns in total.
Every time you unlock a new empowered magic spell, you gain another charge of empowered magic, which refill upon a full rest. This skill only has one level, and costs two skill points to unlock.
Total Base Damage: 24 + 175% of your power

Upgrading this skill grants you access to Barrage, a powerful spell that lets you rain down three successive bolts of lightning onto a single foe, dealing massive damage and stunning them for two turns. Each bolt of lightning can trigger the Electric Shock skill, potentially stunning your foe for five turns in total.
Every time you unlock a new empowered magic spell, you gain another charge of empowered magic, which refill upon a full rest. This skill only has one level, and costs two skill points to unlock.
Total Base Damage: 24 + 175% of your power

Upgrading this skill grants you access to Tempest, an unpredictable spell that calls a thunderstorm upon the battlefield, and rains lightning indiscriminately for five turns. Which does mean that it canand willhit you at times. Tempest has an equal chance of hitting every target on the field. But it's not all bad, because Tempest will deal reduced damage to you, (you are the one who casted it, after all), and it will also infuse your body with a bit extra magic, boosting your magical power until you cast another spell. These lightning bolts ignore the targets defense entirely, and can stun enemies through the Electric Shock skill, but they won't stun you.
Every time you unlock a new empowered magic spell, you gain another charge of empowered magic, which refill upon a full rest. This skill only has one level, and costs two skill points to unlock.

Upgrading this skill grants you access to Tempest, an unpredictable spell that calls a thunderstorm upon the battlefield, and rains lightning indiscriminately for five turns. Which does mean that it canand willhit you at times. Tempest has an equal chance of hitting every target on the field. But it's not all bad, because Tempest will deal reduced damage to you, (you are the one who casted it, after all), and it will also infuse your body with a great deal of extra magic, boosting the damage of the next spell you cast. These lightning bolts can stun enemies through the Electric Shock skill, but they won't stun you.
Every time you unlock a new empowered magic spell, you gain another charge of empowered magic, which refill upon a full rest. This skill only has one level, and costs two skill points to unlock.

Increases the damage of the burn inflicted by the basic fire spell. If you have FireStorm upgraded to burn foes, the damage increase will apply to that as well. This upgrade increases the damage dealt by this skill by 50%. The max level of this skill is 3.

Adds a chance to stun enemies hit by the basic Lightning spell for one turn. Each point in this skill increases the stun chance by 8%. The max level of this skill is 3.

\C[25]\fiThe skill tree is broken up by element, with intersection points for combo effects that use multiple elements. The numbers separating some skills from others indicates that you must have a certain amount of skill points invested into that element to unlock the skills behind those numbers. The skill tree must be navigated with the mouse, click on skills you wish to inspect or level up, or click on the exit to leave the skill tree.\fi

\C[25]Reset skill tree? This has no cost, but if you currently have mana, make sure you learn skills that give you maximum mana, as you will lose any mana you had that exceeds your current maximum when you exit the skill tree.

\C[25]Reset skill tree? This has no cost, but if you currently have mana, make sure you learn skills that give you maximum mana, as you will lose any mana you had that exceeds your current maximum when you exit the skill tree.

Focus your Ice spell towards its natural defensive capabilities. When casting Ice, focus on the shield that forms around you instead of the shards of Ice themselves. As a result, while Frost Shield is active, youll heal for a small percentage of your maximum hp each turn, but reduce the damage of the basic ice spell as well.
Healing per turn: 2.5% of maximum health.

Focus your Ice spell towards its natural defensive capabilities. When casting Ice, focus on the shield that forms around you instead of the shards of Ice themselves. As a result, while Frost Shield is active, youll heal for a small percentage of your maximum hp each turn, but reduce the damage of the basic ice spell as well.
Healing per turn: 2.5% of maximum health.

Make the cone of Flames you fire wider, focusing on igniting everything in sight, partially blinding opponents while they remain ablaze. The unfocused strike has a chance to miss its target as a result.

Make the cone of Flames you fire wider, focusing on igniting everything in sight, partially blinding opponents while they remain ablaze. The unfocused strike has a chance to miss its target as a result.

Focus the power behind the burns your spell leaves behind. Adds a 20% chance to detonate all stacks of burn on the target of this spell, dealing the full damage of that burn immediately. Triggers after burn is normally applied, dealing a minimum of 3 stacks of burn damage. The intense heat of your own spell has a 25% chance to Backfire, which will deal extra damage to both you and your target.

Focus the power behind the burns your spell leaves behind. Adds a 20% chance to detonate all stacks of burn on the target of this spell, dealing the full damage of that burn immediately. Triggers after burn is normally applied, dealing a minimum of 3 stacks of burn damage. The intense heat of your own spell has a 25% chance to Backfire, which will deal extra damage to both you and your target.

Give into the wild nature of Lightning, and let its energy burst from you without restraint. Provides a chance for your basic Lightning spell to strike again, potentially multiple times, but with a smaller chance for the spell to instead strike you in addition to your target.

Give into the wild nature of Lightning, and let its energy burst from you without restraint. Provides a chance for your basic Lightning spell to strike again, potentially multiple times, but with a smaller chance for the spell to instead strike yourself.

Bring Lightning more firmly under your power, and retain extra energy after your strike. For one turn after casting Lightning, you will gain extra power, but holding that energy within you will dim your defenses as well.

Bring Lightning more firmly under your power, and retain extra energy after your strike. For one turn after casting Lightning, you will gain extra power, but holding that energy within you will dim your defenses as well.

Evolved spells allow you to evolve your basic spells, specializing them further to suit certain niches through a combination of benefits and drawbacks. This replaces the default version of the spell, and you can only choose one of the evolutions. Evolved spells require 8 points in their respective elements and cost 1 skill point. Additionally, as a result of your greater understanding of magic as a whole, evolving a spell increases the points you have in each other element by one.

Turn the Ice spell into a more offensive tool. Causing your icicles to be more brittle and shatter as you fire them, dealing a small amount of extra damage to both your target and all other foes. As a result of your Ice being more fragile, the resulting Frost Shield will be slightly weaker.

Turn the Ice spell into a more offensive tool. Causing your icicles to be more brittle and shatter as you fire them, dealing a small amount of extra damage to both your target and all other foes. As a result of your Ice being more fragile, the resulting Frost Shield will be slightly weaker.

By focusing your magical energy, you can unleash spells much more powerful than your normal attacks. The drawback is that your body can only channel such powerful magic a set amount of times before needing rest. You also need to have a certain amount of mastery of an element before using any empowered magic of that type. The basic empowered spells require three points in their element, and costs two points to unlock. Each time you unlock a new empowered magic ability you gain one mana, and each empowered magic spell also costs one mana. Unless otherwise specified, things that restore your strength (like your linking device), will not restore mana.

Increases the damage of \fiall\fi elemental Empowered magic spells by 15%. The max level of this skill is 4. (Elemental refers to Ice, Fire, and Lightning, excludes Pure and Depraved skills). It requires 20 points to be spent on any combination of elements to unlock.
